title: Honeywell
description: Honeywell employs a color palette that reflects its dynamic and innovative brand identity. The primary color, represented by 'EE3124', is a bold red that conveys energy and leadership. Complementary colors include 'FFFFFF' for classic white, '000000' for solid black, and shades of gray '808080' and '707070' for modern flexibility. These colors are documented in the brandâ€™s official Advertising Guidelines, available through their resource materials online.
